CustomField.description: Displays a 1 if the contact is a positive outcome based on employment records. The contact can also have training and education records that qualify as well. Carlos Note: This field seems really unnecessary as the other field already shows the count of Employment records...so like why....
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Displays a 1 if the contact is a positive outcome based on employment records. The contact can also have training and education records that qualify as well.
CustomField.label: 4 Month Positive Outcome Employment
